Description: Fragment of ring base of Chian Wild Goat Style pottery kernos; white slip; exterior: guilloche pattern (mostly worn); graffito on exterior.
Curator's comments: Lemos incorrectly identifies the sherd as coming from the rim of a dinos. The sherd joins British Museum 1965,0930.293.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 246, no. 294)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.2174) (phase 2)
